author: Scott Whitlock

review: Connected this and immediately began sideloading it. 3 hours later it was factory reset and repackaged with a return label on it. Spent another $100 and got a small pc instead. Seriously the best way to have a smart tv with full internet capability. The Fire Tv is just another limited media streaming app based device- after buying apps and installing android apps I still wasn't satisfied. Good technical specs on it though.

review: This is the best purchase I have made in quite a while.  Before getting Fire TV I used a Blu-ray player to stream which was acceptable.  The Fire-TV is incredibly small and the voice searching works very well.

review: Amazing item. Great alternative to an additional cable box.
author: Justin Thatcher

review: While I LOVE how easy it is to find programs the whole family can watch, I don't like how easy it is for a program to be purchased. There are no warnings, approvals, or precautionary measures to guard against accidental purchases.  My 7-year old can easily find programs she wants to watch, but if she clicks too quickly, she's purchased a show without realizing it.That being said, I love how small it is. I love that whatever I purchase stays in my library. I love that I can purchase entire seasons of shows that we watch and not pay as much for monthly "cable" service for shows we aren't watching.
author: Hope Griffith "HGriffith"

review: Before I bought this, Amazon and Netflix were streamed through a Panasonic blue ray player. There was a constant problem with buffering and poor quality picture. Sometimes it was so bad, it became unusable.I bought the Amazon Fire TV device on the advice of a Best Buy sales person. I took it home and had it hooked up in less than ten minutes. It works perfectly! No more buffering. The result is instantaneous display of anything selected. The picture quality is the very best high definition I've seen anywhere. The remote has the ability for the user to speak a title, or other search item such as director, etc. I've tested it in many ways and it has performed with 100% accuracy and with super fast response. Speak the words, "Jimmy Stewart" and you get a near instantaneous listing of every movie for that name.The remote is very well designed and intuitive, little or no learning curve. There's even a quick video tutorial that automatically comes on the first time you use the device that gives clear instructions.The device has been in use for two weeks and has performed flawlessly. At last, stress free entertainment with the very best in quality viewing and trouble free performance!Don
